price: 23. Dan orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan dimasukkan ke dalam surga-surga yang mengalir di bawahnya sungai-sungai. Mereka kekal di dalamnya dengan seizin Tuhan mereka. Ucapan penghormatan mereka dalam (surga) itu ialah salām.*(426)
arabic: وَأُدۡخِلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِمۡۖ تَحِيَّتُهُمۡ فِيهَا سَلَٰمٌ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ud'khila alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā bi-idh'ni rabbihim taḥiyyatuhum fīhā salāmun
